column4: guys, i always get the same errro when trying to use mplayer to play a video "Error opening/initializing the selected video_out (-vo) device." why?
open mplayer from the menu,   ricgclick on it ,  preferences,  video , select a different videomodule,   x11 opengl works best for me
there is a similar problem with the audio if you get it ,  same solution , more or less
look up your tvtuner card model and number in the forum  with any luck there is a howto for you ,  and tvtuner in general if not
okay well i managed to VLC to display it, but there's two inoput jacks, an RF and an AV, i want to use the AV
also, tv tuner does not appear in apt-cache search tvtuner
I never said anyting about the repos  I told you to look in the forum   www.ubuntuforums.org
you could also ask the ppl in #vlc for help in picking the right input
is that channel on this server?
should be,  maybe I hve it wrong
